original_title: UFC Fight Night 146: Lewis vs. dos Santos
overview: UFC Fight Night 146: Lewis vs. dos Santos was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on March 9, 2019 at Intrust Bank Arena in Wichita, Kansas. A heavyweight bout between former UFC Heavyweight Champion Junior dos Santos and former title challenger Derrick Lewis served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 146: Lewis vs. dos Santos
